version_description:
* Added support for 3D touch
* Removed Airplay button in the player
* Bug fixes and optimizations

- The 5 books offline limit is gone! Download as many books you want, just make sure you have enough disk space!
- When finishing a book in a series, the app will give you the option to immediately start with the next book in that series
- New design for book lists with possibility to share lists
- We have improved the way we calculate similar books - you find them at the bottom of any book page. Now you will get even better recommendations!
- Bug fixes and optimizations

- The 5 books offline limit is gone! Download as many books you want, just make sure you have enough disk space!
- When finishing a book in a series, the app will give you the option to immediately start with the next book in that series
- New design for book lists with possibility to share lists
- We have improved the way we calculate similar books - you find them at the bottom of any book page. Now you will get even better recommendations!
- Bug fixes and optimizations

- Ebook reader settings are now saved between uses and books.
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
* Bug fix regarding offline downloading

* We have rebuilt the settings pages dividing it into two sections. One for Account related settings and another for App Settings.
* It is now also possible to change your password from within the Account settings section directly in the app.
* Bug fixes
* Minor bug fixes and improvements

In this version we have made some minor improvements to the filter function in the bookshelf. It will now be easier to hide finished books while still keeping them in your bookshelf. The app will also remember your filter settings between uses. A list of all the books you have in offline mode can be found in the Settings page.

We have also fixed a bug that caused finished books to not appear as finished in book lists.

In this version we have made some minor improvements to the filter function in the bookshelf. It will now be easier to hide finished books while still keeping them in your bookshelf. The app will also remember your filter settings between uses. A list of all the books you have in offline mode can be found in the Settings page.

We have also fixed a bug that caused finished books to not appear as finished in book lists.
* Bug fixes and optimizations
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements

This version prepares the app for iOS 11 and solves a few irritating bugs. Also, if you are one of those using our speed listening feature, you will be happy to hear that we have made the app able to remember your latest listening speed settings between uses.
Solving a serious bug that caused offline books to disappear for some users.
Bug fixes and minor improvements
Bug fixes and minor improvements
In this version we introduce the 0.75x listening speed option that some of you have requested. We also solve a few bugs and performance issues.

In this version we introduce Autoplaying for our Storytel Original series. This means the next episode will automatically start playing when you are finished with an episode. Let the binge-listening begin!
In this version we introduce the 0.75x listening speed option that some of you have requested. We also solve a few bugs and performance issues.
General bug fixes and improvements
General bug fixes and improvements
General bug fixes and improvements

Time to update your Storytel app! So, what's new in this update?

We finally have support for the beautiful iPhone X screen.
We have also improved the VoiceOver experience throughout the whole app.

Enjoy!

Time to update your Storytel app! So, what's new in this update?

We have fixed an issue with the bookmark list and improved the VoiceOver experience for reviews.

Enjoy!

More insect spray applied to rid the app from a few tiny foul bugs. As a result - improved functionality!
No major new features this time, but the app, like a house, needs to be kept clean and have its features polished and upgraded.

В этой версии улучшена стабильность приложения и другие небольшие изменения.

Скоро мы обновим подборки книг. У всех подборок появятся красивые картинки и текстовое описание, а также вы сможете поделиться ими с друзьями.

As soon as you've updated your app downloads will be even faster. Besides that we've cleaned up a few things, fixed a few others and pretty much done some nice improvement work. Enjoy!

More insect spray applied to rid the app from a few tiny foul bugs. As a result - improved functionality!

No major new features this time, but the app, like a house, needs to be kept clean and have its features polished and upgraded.

Share Storytel with your family – in this version we introduce the new feature Kids Mode. With Kids Mode, your child will have a private bookshelf and receive personal recommendations, only with children's books. The feature is now included for all users. The first time you activate Kids Mode you will be asked to set a pin code that can be used to make sure your child stays in Kids Mode.

Happy sharing!

Thanks for using Storytel! Now we've added more personalized book tips by introducing "Because you read" lists, with recommendations based on specific books you've read.

Happy to deliver a requested feature, landscape mode for iPad. You'll find it in the app settings.

Above this, we've worked on some bug fixes for improved performance.

Your feedback makes us better, thank you for sharing your thoughts and helping to improve the experience for more than 800,000 subscribers worldwide!

We are happy to deliver two new features:

- Navigate between chapters. You can now replay a chapter if you forgot to pay attention, or easily skip to the next one. The feature is available in almost all audiobooks, but you might bump into a book or two where the feature is not available yet
- Easily share your favourite books to Instagram & Facebook stories

We also made it easier to listen to books. Instead of saving the book to your bookshelf before consuming you can now with one click start playing your next story.

We are happy to deliver a new search function in this release. You’ll be able to filter on books, authors and narrators in an easier way. Hope you like it!

In this release we are happy to deliver:
- Review a book with emotions. Pick an emoji that best explains the book you just read
- Give your friends Storytel for free for 30 days. You find the offer in the three dotted player menu
- Better search: filter easily on books, authors and narrators

Now you can try out new improvements in the app before anyone else.

We’re always working on the Storytel experience, and your feedback is important. That’s where our new Enthusiast program comes in. Want to join and be the first to explore our latest features and ideas? Go to Settings > App settings and toggle Storytel Enthusiast on. It’s voluntary and you can turn the setting off at any time.

Thank you for helping us get better!

Hurray! There are some great improvements in the app that we think you'd like. Try them out.

1. Search for tags
2. Play from the start button in the player.

- Statistics: track your listening. Are you an early bird or a night owl?
